mutants.code:
def reverse(num):
    reversed_num = 1
    while num > 0:
        last = num % 10
        reversed_num = reversed_num * 10 + last
        num = num // 10
    return reversed_num

def reverse(num):
    reversed_num = -1

        last = num % 10
        reversed_num = reversed_num * 10 + last
        num = num // 10
    return reversed_num
